title: decreasing fps for the last 2 days
body: i have been getting around 100-200 fps which feels really bad IMO because whenever i play there is a slight delay whereas when i usually have 250+ fps i could play with no issues at all. Any suggestion on how to fix this?

replies.body: Your drivers could be outdated and causing fps issues, but there could be other factors like hardware issues or bad game files.  I suggest going through each step of our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune-up your PC.  Hopefully, this will smooth things out!
